more established regulatory bodies for its approach to regulation. bvi fsc regulated brokers are not required to maintain a certain amount of capital in their bank accounts or to segregate client capital from corporate capital. bvi fsc brokers are equally not required to publish their execution policy or to participate in an investor compensation fund.the bvi fsc is making changes to its regulatory law as it matures, but it is worth noting that traders do not enjoy the equivalent level of protection as in other jurisdictions. it is possible to create a segregated portfolio company (spc), but instant trading ltd does not fall into this category. despite the modest regulatory environment, it does not mean instaforex ltd has violated any rules or is actively doing so. this regulator does police its companies and ensures that they are financially sound and competent to carry on as a business. likewise, it is important to note that bvi regulation does allow instaforex ltd to offer higher leverage than other regulators, which could be a significant benefit for some traders.instaforex ltd is a great example of a brokerage in a lesser regulated environment providing a sound service to its traders as evident by over 7,000,000 clients who manage their capital at this broker. segregated accounts are available on request and only for deposits above $100,000. key
